messages.subject: VA Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Right. I m no mail and off to AZ tomorrow morning. 5am start :-( Don t forget the NoVA Unschoolers thing at my house on Friday 13th December. If you want to
messages.messageBody:
Right. I'm no mail and off to AZ tomorrow morning. 5am start :-(

Don't forget the NoVA Unschoolers thing at my house on Friday 13th
December. If you want to come, email me offline and I'll send you my
adddress - when I get back but before the meeting.

Shyrley

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: VA Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Either of those works for me. Christy OK. How about either Friday 13 th ;-) or Wednesday 18th December for an initial get-together? I ll post it on the VA
messages.messageBody:
Either of those works for me.

Christy



OK. How about either Friday 13 th ;-) or Wednesday 18th
December for an initial get-together?
I'll post it on the VA Eclectic list too.

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: VA Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... http://groups.yahoo.com/group/VaEclecticHomeschool/ This is a great list...inclusive, mostly eclectic and unschoolers (several of us here!). They also have
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>>
> What is the addy for the VA eclectic list??
>

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/VaEclecticHomeschool/

This is a great list...inclusive, mostly eclectic and unschoolers (several of us here!).
They also have a fun off-topic list which is pretty interesting (many political discussions)
as well as an off topic religion list which actually manages to be pretty civil (right
Shyrley?).

Great info for hsing in Virginia.

Stephanie E.

messages.subject: Re: VA Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... It would probably be around 3 hrs from you..it takes me about 2.5 hrs to get to Salisbury and Sterling is about 20 mins or so west from me. A straight shot
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., susan marie <scribblers2@e...> wrote:
> where's sterling? I'm near Ocean City MD.
>
> susan

It would probably be around 3 hrs from you..it takes me about 2.5 hrs
to get to Salisbury and Sterling is about 20 mins or so west from me.

A straight shot down Rt 50 over the bay bridge until you hit the DC
beltway.

Stephanie E.

> near the waterfront. It is to a wonderful art show called Art-O-Matic

Unschooling Ungroup when I get back from Arizona.
Week starting 14 th Dec possibly. Any particular days?

The word 'curriculum' will, of course, be banned :-)

Shyrley

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] VA Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: When is the get together? Sometime this week there will be a Maryland UFC get together in DC near the waterfront. It is to a wonderful art show called
messages.messageBody:
When is the get together?
Sometime this week there will be a Maryland UFC get together in DC near the
waterfront. It is to a wonderful art show called Art-O-Matic ( <A HREF="www.artomatic.org">
www.artomatic.org</A> )
Anyone is welcome to join, I'll need to send more info as soon as I get it.
Elissa

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] VA Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: I live in Bear, DE, but my dad lives in Herndon, VA.  We visit him about once a month.  I would love to have a get together to talk.  I m very new to this and
messages.messageBody:
I live in Bear, DE, but my dad lives in Herndon, VA. We visit him about once a month. I would love to have a get together to talk. I'm very new to this and would love advice etc. Especially on getting my husband to agree to homeschooling. Luckily, my son is only 3 so I have a few years to convince him.
Christy

Shyrley <shyrley.williams@...> wrote:On 16 Nov 02, at 22:45, Stephanie Elms wrote:

> Hi Christy! I live in Annandale, VA. About 20-30 mins outside
> Washington DC. Where in Delaware are you? We have a place in
Ocean
> City and spend a good bit of time up there in the summer.
>
> How great to meet a fellow Hokie. I graduated in '91. My kids are
> almost 6 and 2.5.
>
> Nice to meet you!
>
> Stephanie E.
>
Another Unschooler in VA!!! Where were all you guys when I
moved here? All I met were school-at-homers, nearly all of whom
now have nothing to do with me in case my kids let on that
curricula ain't necassary.
I'm in Sterling. Y'all should come over for cookies.

Shyrley
"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."
